description:
The best of two worlds.

Looking for a calculator? Try RPN, you won't regret it; looking for an RPN calculator? You found a great one.

RPN Calculator for WebOS Free combines the benefits of RPN with those of WebOS to give you a tool you will love to have in your mobile device.

RPN calculators are the option of choice for many people, including Engineers and Scientists.

WebOS is an awesome mobile operating system whith a great focus on ease of use and powerful gestures. This application takes full advantage of it and the fact of running on a touch device to take usability to a level that is not reached by traditional RPN calculators.

Add RPN and WebOS and enjoy!

Version 1.1.0 changes:
Fixes for: sin(pi), cos(pi/2), odd root of a negative number.
Now handling AZERTY and QWERTZ keyboards
